  • Method Details

    • getAmount

      public int getAmount(long isbn)
      Tells the amount in stock for a given book id (isbn). There is no effective check if that book is actually known to the assortment.
      Specified by:
      getAmount in interface LocalStock
      Parameters:
      isbn - as identifier of the book in question.
      Returns:
      the amount in stock for the given book.

    • setAmount

      public void setAmount(long isbn, int amount)
      Update the amount of books in local stock, for a given book. There is no effective check if that book is actually known to the assortment.
      Specified by:
      setAmount in interface LocalStock
      Parameters:
      isbn - as identifies of the book in question
      amount - as the new amount in stock for the book in question

    • addEmployee

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      employee - as the employee to add.

    • hasEmployee

      public boolean hasEmployee(String employeeFamilyName)
      Method to look up if an employee with the given name works for this store.
      Specified by:
      hasEmployee in interface LocalStock
      Parameters:
      employeeFamilyName - as the family name of the employy to check for.
      Returns:
      true if an employe with this name works for the local store, false otherwise.

    • getAllEmployeeNames

      public Collection<String> getAllEmployeeNames()
      Generates list of all employee's family names for this local store.
      Specified by:
      getAllEmployeeNames in interface LocalStock
      Returns:
      list of strings with all employees family names.

    • getEntireStock

      public Map<Long,Integer> getEntireStock()
      Returns the entire stock of this location, as an immutable map.
      Specified by:
      getEntireStock in interface LocalStock
      Returns:
      a map, where the key is a book isbn and the value the amount in stock for this isbn.
